main.name: Tyler Quante
main.description: Computer Science graduate from Western Governors University.  I love learning about new technologies and building fun applications for my friends and I to use, and I especially love working with AWS and interesting APIs!
main.bio: After years of deliberating if I was smart enough to really try programming, I finally started realizing that nobody's great the first day.  We all struggle learning this ever evolving field, and the struggle is where growth happens.  I have enjoyed the 'Aha!' moments along the way, and in a weird way, even the mind-numbing bugs have their place in my heart.  Outside of software, I love spending time in the outdoors with friends either hiking, camping, climbing, or skiing, and as a Cincinnati native, Who Dey!

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Discrete Mathematics II, OS for Programmers, and Data Structures & Algorithms II were favorite classes of mine as I studied the field of computer science.  I especially enjoyed learning about modern encryption.

work.title: Java, Microsoft SQL Server, JavaFX
work.description: Desktop application with persistent data that handles user authetication, schedule creation, database connectivity, and displays to the user a detailed view of all scheduled events.

work.title: Python, Greedy Algorithm, PyCharm
work.description: Uses a popular greedy algorithm to deliver 40 packages of various time constraints to over 25 locations around the Salt Lake City area while only traveling 93 miles in 3 hours.

work.title: Python, Geocoding API from Google, eBird API
work.description: Allows users to check for nearby notable bird spottings of any location on earth using the power of multiple APIs.

work.title: Java, Microsoft SQL Server, JavaFX
work.description: Supplies the user live stock information based on private API data.  Includes PE ratios, balance sheet information, and daily movement.

work.title: ReactJS, AWS S3, AWS Cloudfront, AWS Route53
work.description: Website developed with React to display projects I'm proud of.  Hosted with AWS S3, Route53, and cached via Cloudfront which allows for certificate manaagement for https secure connection.
